name: West Pacific Flight Academy
about: West Pacific Flight Academy is a premier flight training institution dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation training programs for aspiring pilots. Located in Honolulu, Hawaii, our school boasts a fleet of the newest and well-maintained aircraft, including Next Generation Light Sport Aircraft. Our experienced instructors, many of whom are former airline pilots, use state-of-the-art technology and training techniques to ensure the highest quality instruction. We offer a range of ratings from Private Pilot to Airline Transport Pilot (ATP) and a Professional Pilot Program that transforms students into commercial pilots within 9-12 months. With a strong focus on safety, quality, and community, we guarantee job placement as a flight instructor upon program completion. Join us to experience the unique benefits of training in Hawaii's diverse and challenging airspace, and let us help you achieve your aviation career goals.
services:
["Private Airplane Pilot Course
Instrumental qualification course
Multi-Engine Qualification Course
Commercial Pilot Course"]
